text: Robert John Nowaskey (February 3, 1918 – March 21, 1971) was an American football end, born in Everett, Pennsylvania, who played eight seasons in the All-America Football Conference (AAFC) and in the National Football League (NFL). ==References== ==External links== * Category:1918 births Category:1971 deaths Category:American football ends Category:Baltimore Colts (1947–1950) players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:George Washington Colonials football players Category:Los Angeles Dons players Category:People from Everett, Pennsylvania Category:Players of American football from Pennsylvania
title: Bob Nowaskey
